website_summaries.verdict: Easy to apply and easy to wear, perfect for everyday vibrant color.
pros: This shadow comes in a stick that is easy to apply and doesn't require a lot of skill
Adds depth and highlights to make eyes shine
Great to wear alone or to layer on top of other colors
cons: The creamy finish gets into the creases of the eye and requires regular blending

customer_reviews.title: Will order again, this color as well as other colors
customer_reviews.text: I was worried spending this much, I normally stick with less expensive brands. But this is worth every penny. Smooth, easy to use, long-lasting, and it only takes a small amount, so it should last a while. Will order again!
customer_reviews.author: Donna McDaniel Fiquett

customer_reviews.title: Great for older skin types
customer_reviews.text: I got this because powder makeup doesn’t go right on my aging skin anymore. The stick is smooth and goes on nicely and stays on. The color is very natural with my medium tone skin. I plan to buy more colors to add more shading.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Goes on effortlessly
customer_reviews.text: I love this product it goes on so easily you don’t need an applicator and the price is really good also!
customer_reviews.author: Donna DeMouth

customer_reviews.title: Clinique is my favorite eye makeup.
customer_reviews.text: Have used this eye shadow in the past. Very good product.
customer_reviews.author: Betty I.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: colour ok, not as dark as it looked in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: hummingbird

customer_reviews.title: Very smooth application
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this color and the smoothness of the product!
customer_reviews.author: Scarlett

customer_reviews.title: Goes on smoothly
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to replace the discontinued Lid Smoothies eye shadow. Actually, I tried a lot of different products and the Chubby Stick is the best replacement for me. It goes on smoothly and is blendable, if you blend right after applying.
customer_reviews.author: heybam

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for years and love it!!
customer_reviews.author: S Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love this! I have chronic dry eye disease and can't wear much makeup. This goes on smoothly, does not flake into my eyes like regular eyeshadow and it stays on all day
customer_reviews.author: laura

customer_reviews.title: Very nice eyeshadow
customer_reviews.text: Nice smooth application. Color looks neutral on me which is what I was looking for, and I have very fair color skin.
customer_reviews.author: Lorina

customer_reviews.title: Already Used?
customer_reviews.text: Looked like it had been used. I hate to write a bad review, but I was not happy with the condition the product arrived in. There was not plastic covering and the tip of the stick was worn down.
customer_reviews.author: Ama-Zombie2020

product_meta.title: Clinique Chubby Stick Shadow Tint for Eyes - # 02 Lots O' Latte 3g/0.1oz
product_meta.description: An innovative eye shadow stickFeatures a fine texture that is easy to apply & blendBoasts a layerable & long-wearing formulaProvides a sheer wash of lightweight creamy color Safe for sensitive eyes & contact lens-wearers To use: Apply directly to eyelids. Blend gently upward & outward. Build to desired intensity. Layer with multiple shades
feature_bullets: Chubby Stick Shadow Tint for Eyes
